Actions.Name: Unholy
Actions.Effects: Sealed foes must sacrifice 4. Then, attack target is sealed.

Actions.Name: Fear
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in range 6. While marked, that foe deals half damage unless adjacent to an ally. If they end their turn adjacent to an ally, they can save to clear this mark.

Actions.Name: Black Communion
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes take 2 damage. Allies gain 2 vigor. Then, create a difficult terrain effect space of grasping dead hands underneath every foe in the area. While inside a grasping hands space, foes are sealed+ and cannot gain vigor.

Actions.Name: Radiance of the Black Sun
Actions.Description: The [name] becomes immobile but gains Aura 2 until the start of its next turn. While the aura is active, Relict other than the [name] in the area cannot be reduced past 1 hp.
